title: RedBus SDE 1 Vs Tricon SDE 1 | Need Help
content:
Education: Tier 3 college (ECE)
Years of Experience: 1.8
Prior Experience: Product based company
Prev CTC: 6.36 LPA


Date of the Offer: 16 Feb 2025
Company: Redbus (Product Based)
Title/Level: SDE 1
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 12L(10.5 fixed and 1.5 variable)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: -
Stock bonus: -
Bonus: - 
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 12L


Date of the Offer: 17 Feb 2025
Company: Tricon Infotech (Service Based)
Title/Level: SDE 1(MERN)
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 15.5L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: - 15K
Stock bonus: -
Variable - 1.5LPA
Total comp (Salary + Variable + Stock): 17LPA

I am in a dilemma between product-based and service-based company. Any suggestions are welcome.

title: Wayfair | SE2 (L2) | Bengaluru
content:
Education: B.Tech IT from IIIT
Years of Experience: 2.5
Prior Experience: Product Security Engineer 2 at Fintech
Prev Comp : ~ 18L Fixed + ~ 2L Bonus + ~1Lac ESOP (1 year)


Date of the Offer: Jan 2025
Company: Wayfair
Title/Level: Software Engineer 2 -  Application Security
Location: Bangalore, India
Salary: 34L Fixed (32 Basic + 2 PF)
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock : 0
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 34L
Benefits: Standard Wayfair Benefits (Complimentary Breakfast and Lunch, Cab Service, Hefty Learning Wallet Budget, etc.)

Accepted the offer
